Welcome: SG Studios Game API Platform Documents
p1h21: You have to apply developer account before using the SG Studios Game API Platform. You can go
p1h22: for registration. Fill in the company name and the contact person to open your account.
p1h3: Waiting for administrators to send a Confirm Email after registration. Click the link to launch your developer account after receiving the mail.
p1h41: After the developer account being launched, you can go
p1h42: add new game to SG Studios Game API Platform.
p1h5: Waiting for the administrators to open your game. You can get the Game ID and Private Key after receiving the Open Email. Then you can use SG Studios Game API Platform.
